profile.bio: I'm a Product Manager in the Developer Tools group at Oracle. I specialize in JavaScript, HTML, CSS and REST.  NetBeans Project Easel is a current focus. I'm also the co-author of "Java EE and HTML5 Enterprise Application Development" from Oracle Press
